import React from 'react' import { Slide } from 'react-slideshow-image'; import 'react-slideshow-image/dist/styles.css' import img from "..//slide2.png" const SliderCard = () => { const slideImages = [ { url: { img }, caption: 'Slide 1' }, { url: { img }, caption: 'Slide 2' }, ]; const zoomOutProperties = { indicators: true, scale: 0.4, indicatorsColor: "white", arrows: false, } return ( <>
{slideImages.map((slideImage, index) => (

))}
